text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Let's rewind a couple days...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh? Sorry, I don't think I heard youright. You're telling me not topick? That I should run both?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh... And you don't just mean<n>junior year? You want
me to run both<n>dirt and turf for the whole series?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So... so you're saying it's okay even<n>if I pick all sorts of
races on all kinds<n>of tracks?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait, wait, wait! That can't be<n>possible!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
That's like booking yourself a<n>one-way trip on the Orient
Express! On<n>the Titanic! If we split our efforts in<n>half like
that, we'll just get crummy<n>results in both!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And why's that?!
choice_data_list: Because you work twice as hard as anyone!
Because you work twice as hard as anyone!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Because I work twice as...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...I guess I have been doing mydue diligence. I give praise at mymerch shrine every single day andthank my idols for their blessings.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Do you really think... my love of Umas<n>will pay off?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Have I racked up enough good karma<n>as a fan? Enough to
shine as an<n>Umamusume myself?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Enough to run wild? On any track I<n>want?! Even if I'll never
be as good<n>as my oshis, I'm at least good<n>enough to
make it through the series?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Idol worship tangent aside, I think<n>Agnes Digital is finally on
the same<n>page as me.
choice_data_list:
Yeah! You've got what it takes to be an
all-rounder!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: AND IIIIIIIIII WILL ALWAYS LOVE<n>UUUUMAS!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: A-anyways! You're right, I did put in<n>double the effort!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: But wow... me, an all-rounder...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Haaaasdhjk... It sounds so cool I'm<n>just??? Like, an
all-rounder can get<n>away with doing literally anything,<n>
right?
choice_data_list: ...In terms of what races you pick, yes!
...In terms of what races you pick, yes!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, absolutely! I'll follow fan etiquette<n>to a tee! No touching
or requests—just<n>look respectfully! Hehe...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Still... I can't believe I'm being<n>rewarded for all my loyal
simping!<n>Even a lowly fangirl like me has a<n>place in
paradise...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Squee!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
All right, you've won me over! I'll be<n>an all-rounder! I'll run
turf and dirt and<n>admire all my oshis up close!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And that is why we're at thetryouts, signed up for two races.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...Whew, looks like I'm up next. Here<n>goes nothing! If I
don't make it back,<n>tell my oshis I loved them!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Technically, you're only allowed to<n>enter one tryout
race—per track type.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The only thing stopping racers from<n>entering both is
common sense. It's<n>unheard of, but I'm sure Agnes<n>
Digital can pull it off!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(This track is a sacred place where<n>countless Umas got their
start. I<n>absolutely can't do it shame. No...)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (A true fan would do it proud! I'llrun so beautifully that the trackSHINES!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: All racers are in their gates... and<n>they're off!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(They power through the dirt, beads<n>of sweat glistening in
their wake! The<n>sheer ferocity is just. So. Dazzling!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Agnes Digital pushes her way<n>forward! What a
stunning spurt!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (The turf muffles the sound of theirfootsteps, and I can hear thembreathing heavily... Look at how theystretch their legs so elegantly... I'vegot to get a closer look! They'reall so...)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: They're so unique! I love them<n>ALLLLL!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Agnes Digital tears down the<n>turf like it's nothing!
Have you ever<n>seen duality like this?!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What on earth?! How is she this good<n>at both? That racer...
She's got the<n>makings of a legend!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Agnes Digital puts on a performance<n>greater than I could've
dreamed of!<n>As soon as she crosses the finish<n>line, I
jump to go congratulate her.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thanks a billion! I'm just<n>grateful that I got to see all
my oshis<n>up close!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And it's all thanks to you! If I didn't<n>have you stanning
with—

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Pardon, I just wanted to congratulate<n>you on those runs!
You had me<n>baffled, running dirt and turf like it<n>was
nothing!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hwaaagh?! Uh, um!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I'd be more than happy to manage<n>your training plans! We
can start with<n>dirt in junior year to build strength,<n>then
shift to turf for the rest of—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Um! S-sorry, but... I can't do that.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking for something more<n>balanced! I don't want to
limit myself<n>to just one style, so... I'm going to be<n>an
all-rounder! And, um—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I actually, uh... I already decided to<n>accept a scout offer from
this trainer<n>here!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: J-just play along! Did you seethe way this creep butted into ourconvo?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Whew, thanks. I didn't expect to<n>attract that much attention.
Sorry for<n>making a scene.
choice_data_list: That's fine, but about that "scout offer"...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ah, heheh... I just said the first thing<n>that came to mind,
sorry.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I did mean it, though! As you can<n>probably tell, I'm not
exactly the best<n>at talking to people...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But you're as much of an Uma fan as<n>I am, so I don't have
to hold back like<n>I do with other trainers.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention, you're the only one<n>who's ever respected
my interests,<n>and I doubt I'll find another. So,<n>please!
Would you be my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Yessss! Oh, that's a relief. I can't<n>wait to get started!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Every Umamusume has their own<n>reason to run. No matter
what shape<n>their dreams take, I want to help<n>make them
shine.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Oh, also. I almost forgot to ask.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Which color light stick do you want?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You're staying to watch the rest of<n>the tryouts, right?
We've gotta rack<n>up today's karma points too! C'mon!
